nodes.text: "Left Eye" Krolak was a Weequay male criminal who was imprisoned by the Galactic Republic in Belsavis prison, a prison facility on the planet Belsavis. Krolak was freed from imprisonment during the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War, and could be found in the cantina of the Sith Empire's Imperial Lodgement in the Minimum Security Section.
"Left Eye" Krolak appears as a Cantina Vendor for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
